name: Glitch Strike
description:
In Glitch Strike, you are a low-level hacker just trying to scrape a living - until you find yourself at the center of a criminal conspiracy which threatens the stability of your world. Develop new weapons, overcome enemy hackers in tactical turn-based combat, and protect your allies.

Challenging Tactical Gameplay - Deploy units and customize them to respond to the battlefield. Spend your actions carefully to overcome intelligent enemies and overwhelming forces.

Customizable Units - Add modules to your units to customize their behavior. Improve your units' offensive and defensive capabilities, change their movement capabilities, and more. Over 300,000 possible playable units.

Brutal Puzzles - Face challenging one- and two- turn puzzles throughout the story campaign, and solve procedurally generated vault hacking puzzles.

Engaging Campaign - Rise from a low-level hacker to an infamous cyber operative over 24 missions.
